snippet: “Nous: A Musical Rite” included a mix of alternative music and dance at Basilica Hudson.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews interdisciplinary musical happening Nous: A Musical Rite, organized by composer Christopher Bono at Basilica Hudson in Hudson, NY.
lead_paragraph: “Nous: A Musical Rite” included a mix of alternative music and dance at Basilica Hudson.

headline.print_headline: Luring With Sound, but Aiming for Something Deeper
headline.seo: ‘Nous: A Musical Rite’ at Basilica Hudson
headline.main: Luring With Sound, but Aiming for Something Deeper
